lines.text: You don't do your own laundry do you?
Oh yes, this is my maid's year off!
Just think, someday i'll be Mrs. Doctor Pennypepper E. Pennypepper... then I'll find out what the E. stands for!
I don't know... just to break up the monotony, I guess.
All stories start the same way. B, boy. G, girl.
Well, it was having so much that made me realize how little I really had. I'll never go back to having so little again as long as I live.
There's nothing automatic about this apartment, you want something done, you'll have to do it yourself.
Here! Everybody come in here! Bring somebody with you!
